DOC.brief_summary: The present study is a phase III randomized and multicentric trial evaluating the potential additional impact effect of two years adjuvant androgen deprivation when combined with neoadjuvant (4 months) and high-dose (76 Gy) conformal radiotherapy in moderate high-risk prostate cancer patients. Stratification will be performed by prognostic factors and by participating institution.
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Trials of Adjuvant Androgen Deprivation in Localized Prostate Cancer
